website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful bottle opener that your guests can use for years to come.
pros: Multiple styles of keys to choose from
Key tags come pre-stamped with a fun message, leaving space on the back for you to write your own
Bottle opener is both useful and aesthetically pleasing
cons: Some have complained of missing key tags in their orders

customer_reviews.title: Well made, strong, super cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as souvenirs for my wedding and it came out really nice. Very good quality, heavy and overall super cute. One of the keys came broken but I ordered enough for the amount of guests I had so it didn’t really affect me.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Gift/Wedding Favor
customer_reviews.text: I added address labels to the back with guest names & table numbers so these served as my escort cards. It turned out really cute & aside from being adorable the fact they work pretty well to open bottles was a major plus for me. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: JaNaely

customer_reviews.title: Ideal gifts for wedding guests
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome thing I ordered for my wedding. The keys are beautifully crafted and the high quality cards make them more stunning! Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We got these to give out as favors at our upcoming wedding reception. We are making bottled beer and soda available. These key bottle openers are perfect! We received 60 keys, tags, and chains. They are all in good condition. They even gave us 4 extra chains. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Readhead

customer_reviews.title: Recommended as party/wedding favors.
customer_reviews.text: One big bag with each opener in it's own bag with the chain. You will have to put the chain on each one, which isn't a big deal because the cardstock tags are bundled together with a rubber band. Card stock is pretty good too. You can easily write or stamp on the back of them if you wish to personalize. Pretty fun favor for the price. I wanted something better than the typical koozie for my wedding favors. They feel pretty sturdy too. Shouldn't have a problem opening bottles. They are very light weight too.
customer_reviews.author: Kris G.

customer_reviews.title: They were okay.
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute the problem is I didn't get 60 in the package. I got about 54 to start. Then out of the 54 I had for that were damaged so I wasn't able to use these for my wedding and had to buy something last minute. I waited too long or I would have returned them. I think if you order these early enough and you can return them or have them correct it it would be a great value
customer_reviews.author: Serena S

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: One was broken but I dont mind :) These are very sturdy and I cant wait to use them as wedding favors for our wedding this year on 11/30/19 :D Thank you! Also, the cards are preprinted just like the pic shows :)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great favors for price and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for wedding favors. I don't know about durability yet in terms of use, but they seem durable enough. My only complaint is there was a tag missing. I had to order more anyhow, so I think I will have plenty, but I received 60 keys with chains, extra chains, and 59 tags. Overall, I am happy with the purchase. Update: second order came with extra tags so it all worked out!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for durable products!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our wedding which was moved around all over that we ended up at the JP. Thanks COVID-19! Still, these were a spectacular purchase! The keys are sturdy and dense. The tags feel durable, not thin. I'm glad I purchased these, and you should too!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Guests LOVED the idea!
customer_reviews.text: These were the best idea! Guests raved about them, and even my teen daughters thought they were sweet. Easy to assemble (put your mothers to work) and added a nice touch to tables. I bought 50 keys for 50 guests, I'd say buy HALF what you need. I ended up with 25 on the tables at the end of the day. GUess they will go up on Marketplace ;)
customer_reviews.author: suzanne swift

customer_reviews.title: Cute Product
customer_reviews.text: WE bought these for trinket gifts at my son's wedding. They are nice little tokens and are made very well for the price. The only drawback is that the keys, tags, and chains all come in separate little packages, so you have to attach the little chain to the key and the tag yourself. However, it only took us about 20 minutes to put all of them together (two people).
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding favor
customer_reviews.text: Used these for party favors for my wedding. They are very nice & great quality. Everyone really liked them. The back of the card is blank so we added custom labels to it to add our own personal touch. 10 out of 10, I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Price. Would Definitely Purchase Again.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. Only thing negative to say is that half way through the holes weren't punched out enough and I had to struggle to get the punch out off without tearing the cardboard tag. Still a great value for the price. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: All 60 came in perfect condition, haven't used to open a bottle but seems to be of good quality. Perfect little party favors for our wedding.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It's value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as wedding souvenirs and I absolutely love them. It takes a little time to assemble but I bought them three months in advance so I have time. Some of the packages are missing the latch that holds the chain together but then they've placed extra chains in the bag so it evens out. All in all a great purchase no regrets. The quality is also really good. They feel very sturdy and I love the finish on them.
customer_reviews.author: Trishann

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, but colors didn't work out for the bride!
customer_reviews.text: Initially thought these would be the best choice for the favors to match the bride's wedding theme, but she opted for different colors. Tend to be dark in tone, but great for it's look on value!
customer_reviews.author: xsheenah!

customer_reviews.title: Best Wedding Favors!
customer_reviews.text: These are super quality made and they even send a few extra chains in case some are missing the connector piece! They look rustic and antique which was EXACTLY what I wanted. And these are very sturdy and will not break :) So excited to give them away at our wedding reception
customer_reviews.author: brandi blair

customer_reviews.title: Fun Reception Gift for Guests!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of these for our wedding reception. We thought they’d be a fun wedding gift for people to take. I had to assemble them beforehand which took a little time but it’s great quality for the price once they’re all set up. They were a huge hit and a fun message. Definitely Reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great product, small issue that was quickly fixed.
customer_reviews.text: *** real review!!!!!!! These are fantastic. They are solid. Not plastic! They do not come assembled together (paper on the chain on the key) which is good because I have to hold on to these for a couple months and I don’t want the papers to get worn and ruined. I did have an issue with some of the clasps missing and when I brought this to their attention they refunded me some of my money back which was thoughtful. I can’t wait to give these to my wedding guests.
customer_reviews.author: Kelleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as wedding favors. Some of the chains that link the key to the tag were missing pieces or too tight to use. Luckily extra pieces were included! Same product on Etsy was way more expensive. Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer12

customer_reviews.title: Love these, sturdy great value!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as wedding favors and love the idea, we are sure our guests will love them, we wanted to get a small little something for everyone and this product did the trip!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect favors for our June wedding. It will take some labor, as the key chain and the fun note all come as separate pieces. But really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Slider

customer_reviews.title: Key bottle opener :).
customer_reviews.text: Me and my fiancé love this!!! they are adorable and worth every price as a wedding gift and I found out this are on Etsy it is so much expensive but them on here :). U won’t regret it 😍😍😍 package very well and shipped fast as well great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Cutest wedding favors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 packs of 60 and they all arrived in perfect condition. Even included 5 extra chains in every pack just incase some didnt have any. The notes all came perfect as well. Gives you a blank space on other side to customize it for your event. We're deciding on custom stickers to place to add our touch, those were inexpensive as well. Seems like they will last years to come. No regret with these. Perfect addition to our wedding for our guest.
customer_reviews.author: ItsJustLili

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The keys are beautiful. Each key is individually wrapped so you have to tie the tags to the keys but it was not hard to do at all. Cute little wedding gift 🥰
customer_reviews.author: McClureS

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. Bought them for a friends bridal shower as gifts for the guests. They are heavy and durable. The font on the cards is super cute. The price is reasonable. I would definitely order again. I only gave 4 stars as we were 2 short in keys.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Castrillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wedding memory piece!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! Better then I had expected. You do have to put the notes on them, but totally doable. Strong and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless.
customer_reviews.text: Flawless. These were perfect for my cousins 50th Birthday Party as thank for coming gifts. I draped them around beer bottles and pop bottles.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my eye on these for my wedding favors for a while now, and I'm SO glad I got them. Out of the 120 I received, there was one broken key. Overall, they seem pretty sturdy and they are so cute! I love that they come with a cute tag to attach. The antique look is nice, they're perfect for my rustic wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: These keys are absolutely precious! And the fact that they’re also bottle openers? OH YEAH! Totally worth the buy and I’m totally happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Serina

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: We're attached these keys to a compass for our rustic, love is a journey themed wedding. They went great together. The keys were sturdy and beautiful. Great quality. Love the material. Was so happy when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: O. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our baby shower
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as favors for our baby shower everybody loved them our baby shower was vintage theme. color is perfect and they are well made
customer_reviews.author: Danielrt23

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They feel thick so I’m not worried about them breaking easily. They are just as pictures color and design wise. The cardboard message that goes with it are super cute. I bought these as my wedding favors. They are so worth the buy and super cute gifts for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Overall very happy with this purchase! They are sturdy and actually do open bottles easily. I have them on my key set and are going to use these as wedding favors. The tags are nice and I was able to put a message on the back for these. I think they are a great idea as a thank you gift since they are something most of your guests can reuse! These were the best price you can get for the quality and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Favors
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are something people enjoyed for a wedding shower favor
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Favor Win!
customer_reviews.text: These were a favorite at my blessing ceremony! I spent a little bit of time writing our name/date on the back with a nice caligraphy pen, added a nice tulle purple bag and they were simply perfect! Super cute, practical and budget friendly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Sturdy and Cute Tags!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical after reading the reviews but I gave it a shot anyway! So far so good. The tag actually has the writing on it... I was totally prepared to write after reading the reviews that said that the cards were blank. The key is sturdy and it looks really expensive lol. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect thank you gifts for wedding. Easy to assemble, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Party Favor
customer_reviews.text: These are great easy party favors. I haven't opened a bottle yet, but they seem durable. They look nice. I'm going to give them out at my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Key bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: These key bottle openers are so beautiful and sturdy. I’m planning my parents a 25th wedding anniversary and these were the best little party favors I know everyone will love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Look exactly as pictured. Fantastic quality. Very happy to be using as wedding favors for our sons upcoming nuptials. Would buy again. Amazing value for product!

customer_reviews.title: Crowd pleaser for wedding favors!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for part of our wedding gifts and the guests love them. A great value for the price!

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love! These are super cute and made well. They send you extra chains maybe incase any are broken or missing. Didn't have an issue with them though. Pretty easy to assemble them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae Bankes

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required lol great buy
customer_reviews.text: So I missed the part where it said assembly required... lol lol very nice wedding favor. And good buy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wedding Favors!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our wedding favors. You have to loop them all together, but that is fine since they were a cheaper option. They look great though! Do what they are meant to! Shouldn’t break if you use them right! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lblack

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be good quality can’t wait to use for my wedding

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery and product
customer_reviews.text: These are for my daughters wedding. They came quickly and look great!

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as party favors for my wedding guests, and they LOVED THEM. We got so many complements on these!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome concept

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Soo cute!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved these!!! I got them for favors at my SIL’s Bridal Shower. They were much better quality than I was expecting.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, but assembly required
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for our wedding. People loved them, once they figured out it was a bottle opener 🤣 They do come in 3 seperate parts, tag, key, chain, that you have to assemvle yourself. Not hard, just takes some time.
customer_reviews.author: meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for weddings!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these!! Must have these for your event because they are so cute!

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding guest gifts
customer_reviews.text: These were great as gifts to guests at our wedding
customer_reviews.author: Brizzbane

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Used as favors at our wedding. Very durable and sturdy. Was pleasantly surprised. Just time consuming when threading the tags with the key and metal ball chain. Definitely cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich Reimert

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 so great! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this purchase. I love the fact the cards already are printed. This will save time and money. Also i love that it comes with a chain instead of twine. This will make it easy for my guests to put their key on their keychain. Though putting them together is a bit tedious, it is worth it!

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my sosn wedding , they were a huge hit at the wedding and i love seeing them on key chains of our family and friends since the wedding, great reminder of that beautiful day! They are sturdy are work great!! Only regret is that i did not buy more, they were gone quickly!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA MINNAERT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect favors
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect favors for my wedding. I got so many compliments on them. They were also easy to put the tags on. Definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Loved Them!

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my bridal shower in August, and I am sooooo happy with it. It comes with the key bottle openers and the tags that go along with it. They are durable, and so pretty! You get a lot of bang for your buck! Super impressed!

customer_reviews.title: The key to a perfect wedding favor...
customer_reviews.text: Seem more expensive...for both the tags and keys. Such great price for the quality!

customer_reviews.title: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute! Can't wait to give out at my wedding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to give out as favors for my wedding. They are very cute, and of very good quality. I was actually shocked at how heavy they were. The package came on time, and I would highly suggest these!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wedding favors. Couldn’t believe the quality and sturdiness of the key given the pride. Awesome buy.

customer_reviews.title: Metal is brittle
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 120 of these for our wedding, which was close to the exact number we needed for the our guest total. The problem was, we were waiting for our paper goods printer to make custom tags for us, and did not inspect the bottle openers right away. Low and behold, we find two that were broken, and it was past the limit for replacements.

customer_reviews.title: Really well made and adorable party favor!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty and well made... I love how the tags are pre printed... I was very glad that a few extra chains were included, because I had two that were broken... So having the extra chain worked out really well... This will be a great favor to pass out at the wedding...

I was charged for the extra bags because I couldn’t return the originals I had already put together.

product_meta.title: DerBlue 60 PCS Key Bottle Openers,Vintage Skeleton Key Bottle Opener, Wedding Favors Key Bottle Opener Rustic Decoration with Escort Tag Card
feature_bullets: 1. Material: Made of Metal Alloy; Quantity: 60 Keys and 60 kraft tags Cards,60 Chains
2. Size: Key Size: 3.1 x 1.1inch;Key Weight: 16.5g,Escort Card: 3.7 x 1.77inch

3. The Tag Card printed greetings, without stamping or write it by yourself, save your time. Furthermore, no need to explain to every of your guests that it's actually a bottle opener again and again.
4. Whether your theme is vintage, classic, rustic or somewhere in between, these party-favors will accentuate almost any style with extra flair.
5. Add extra charm to your wedding by gifting these gorgeous skeleton keys that are actually bottle openers!
